Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
Simulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
gui.Simulable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BallsSimulator, BoidsSimulator, GridSimulator
public abstract class Simulator extends Object implements gui.Simulable
Abstract class for the management of the display for all games. Implements the interface Simulable which takes care of the display.
